WhatToSay: Information printed when the mod is loaded
empire_tab_description: This mod currently provides default Chinese/English language templates for the game
create_empire_description: Set the current country's level to Empire
empire_selected: A country has been selected; select a different country to create a new empire
unity_joined_empire: This country has been incorporated into the empire's sphere of influence
create_title_description: Click a city to create a new title
add_title_description: Add the selected city to the specified title
empire_royal_clan_changed: $actor$ usurped the Mandate of $empire$, renaming it $new_empire_name$.
kingdom_royal_clan_changed_2: $new_clan$ defeated $old_clan$ to become the new ruler of $kingdom$
powerful_minister_aquire_empire_war: $title$ $ministor$ attempted to claim the Mandate of $empire$, instigating war
opinion_different_empire_with_other_subs: Another Empire of the Same Subspecies
ministor_try_aqcuire_empire_log: $title$ $ministor$ attempted to seize the Mandate of $empire_name$
ministor_aqcuire_empire_log: $title$ $ministor$ successfully claimed the Mandate, naming the empire $new_empire_name$
empire_powerful_minister_aquire_title: Powerful minister $ministor$ requested a title from $empire$’s monarch, becoming $title$
become_kingdom_log: $actor$ renamed the kingdom to $kingdom$ upon acquiring the title $title$
city_add_to_title_log: $city$ has been added to the jurisdiction of $title_name$
plot_ministor_acquire_title: Powerful Minister Attempts to Acquire Title
title_layer_description: Shows titles on the current map
kingdom_selected_first: First kingdom selected; select a second kingdom or an empire to create a new empire or join an empire
city_selected_first: First city selected; select a second city or a title area to create or join a title
city_add_to_title: City has been added to the title’s jurisdiction
history_new_empire: $title$ $actor$ proclaimed themselves Emperor at $place$, named the empire $name$, with capital at $place$
history_new_emperor: $actor$ ascended the throne at $place$, era name $year_name$
history_powerful_ministor: $title$ $actor$ seized control of the court; $actor2$ became a puppet
histroy_be_vassal: $title$ $actor$ became a vassal to the empire
history_name_previous_emperor: $actor$ posthumously honored the previous emperor $actor$, bestowing the posthumous name $shihao$ and temple name $miaohao$
history_change_capital: $actor$ decided to relocate the capital; new capital is $place$
history_refund_empire: After the empire’s capital fell, the ministers enthroned a new emperor at $place$ and rebuilt the empire
history_back_to_original_capital: $actor$ lived up to expectations, recaptured $place$, and returned to the original capital.
